Name: Horse
SeedDescription: Plant these in summer or winter. Takes 13 days to mature.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plántalas en verano o invierno. Tardan 13 días en madurar.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: 여름 또는 겨울 작물. 성장하려면 13일이 소요됩니다.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: À planter en été ou en hiver. Prend 13 jours pour arriver à maturité.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Ezeket nyáron ültesse el. 13 napig tart megérniük.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: 夏と冬植えの種。13日で収穫できる。
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante isso no verão ou inverno. Leva 13 dias para amadurecer.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Сажайте их летом или зимой. Созревание занимает 13 дней.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.tr: Yazın ve Kışın ekilir. 13 günde yetişir.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 夏天或冬天播种。13天成熟。
